title: [Character Selection Proposal] Pool Pick
body:
Pool Pick.

An option for custom games, or special game modes.

10 champs are randomly picked from the whole lot, and teams take turns on picking characters from the "pool".

Still all the random goodness, without the huge overbalance issues that sometimes arise.

replies.body: You mean 20 champs are picked, and teams take turns picking the champions they want to use, and the final 10 discarded?
Well that could work also, but the idea was the 10 randomed had to be divvied out.
